net.i2p.crypto.eddsa.math

Interface ScalarOps

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BigIntegerScalarOps, Ed25519ScalarOps

    public interface ScalarOps
extends Serializable
    Since:
    0.9.15

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      byte[] multiplyAndAdd(byte[] a, byte[] b, byte[] c)
      $r = (a * b + c) \bmod l$
      byte[] reduce(byte[] s)
      Reduce the given scalar mod $l$.

    • Method Detail

      • reduce

        byte[] reduce(byte[] s)
        Reduce the given scalar mod $l$.

        From the Ed25519 paper:
        Here we interpret $2b$-bit strings in little-endian form as integers in $\{0, 1,..., 2^{(2b)}-1\}$.

        Parameters:
        s - the scalar to reduce
        Returns:
        $s \bmod l$

      • multiplyAndAdd

        byte[] multiplyAndAdd(byte[] a,
                      byte[] b,
                      byte[] c)
        $r = (a * b + c) \bmod l$
        Parameters:
        a - a scalar
        b - a scalar
        c - a scalar
        Returns:
        $(a*b + c) \bmod l$
